channel.title: Weird delay
channel.description:
Pi source 317 Lost legacy
When i teleport i can run to the side and theres a small delay then it teles. when i do skillcapes emote i can click to the side and i can move while the skillcape emote does the emote by itself with no character.
My question- How can i put a delay so if i tele/do emote or anything like that. I cant click to walk somewhere till its done the emote or teleport.
